title: Blended Learning Workshop to Strengthen Digital Learning and Assessment Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool utilization skills and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: A digital learning design competency enhancement course in language education for pre-service and in-service teachers, requiring mobile-optimized design considering PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can design formative assessments using digital assessment tools in a blended learning environment.
Learners can develop a class operation plan utilizing a smartphone-based Learning Management System (LMS).
Learners can develop language education scenarios integrating digital learning materials and face-to-face activities.

resources: Digital assessment tools (Quizlet, Google Forms, etc.)
Open Educational Resources (OER) for language education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
